Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) show great promise as new power generators with high efficiency.
Titulo: Development of new fast oxide ion conductor and application for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Decreasing the operating temperature is critically required for the further development of SOFC.
Titulo: Development of new fast oxide ion conductor and application for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This review introduces that oxide ion conductivity in the perovskite oxide of LaGaO3, which was found by our group.
Titulo: Development of new fast oxide ion conductor and application for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: LaGaO3 doped with La and Mg exhibits the high oxide ion conductivity over a wide P-O2 range; the value is higher than that Of Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 by an order of magnitude.
Titulo: Development of new fast oxide ion conductor and application for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When LaGaO3-based oxide was used as the electrolyte of SOFC, the power density could be improved greatly, in particular over the low-temperature range.
Titulo: Development of new fast oxide ion conductor and application for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, the power generating property of LSGM using a thin film of LaGaO3 is also introduced.
Titulo: Development of new fast oxide ion conductor and application for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the cell using LaGaO3-based oxide is as high as 0.6 W cm(-2) at 773 K.
Titulo: Development of new fast oxide ion conductor and application for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This suggests that SOFC could be operable at temperature lower than 773 K.
Titulo: Development of new fast oxide ion conductor and application for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
